snippet: Saying he was “not comfortable” with the original seven-year prison terms he imposed, Judge Jerry W. Baxter cut them to three years.
abstract: Judge Jerry W Baxter reduces sentences for three former Atlanta administrators in cheating case from seven years in prison to three.
lead_paragraph: Saying he was “not comfortable” with the original seven-year prison terms he imposed, Judge Jerry W. Baxter cut them to three years.

headline.main: Judge Reduces 3 Sentences in Atlanta School Testing Scandal
headline.print_headline: Judge Reduces 3 Sentences in Atlanta School Testing Scandal
